searchingCatalogs.description: Message displayed while catalogs are being searched, updated as the count decreases

welcomeNewUserYouHaventSetup.message: It looks like you haven't set up the Library Extension yet!

welcomeNewUserSetup.message: To get started setting up your library, click on the icon that looks like a stack of books in the address bar.

noSimilarTitleForBinding.message: No similar titles for your filters were found

additionalHiddenItem.message: <%= count %> other item was found. Click here to see it.

additionalHiddenItems.message: <%= count %> other items were found. Click here to see them.

invalidTitle.message: This title is not a valid title.

titleUnavailable.message: This title does not appear to be available

Config_ImportDirections.message: Copy and paste the content of your configuration file into the textbox below. Click the Import button to import your configuration.

Config_ImportInvalidConfigurationFile.message: Invalid configuration file. No changes made

Config_LoginRequiredField.message: This field is required to login

Config_UpToDate.message: Your version of the extension is up-to-date.

Config_tmplViewReleaseNotes.message: View the release notes for this version.

Config_tmplPermissionsError.message: There appears to be a permissions issue preventing the Library Extension from working properly. Please visit $URL$/help/permissions-issues for help resolving this issue.

Config_tmplNewVersionAvailable.message: A newer version of this extension is available. Click here for details

Config_tmplContactingService.message: There was a problem contacting the Extension servers. Please try again later or visit $URL$/help/ for status updates.

catalogDisabled.message: The $DESCRIPTION$ is no longer being offered by $LIBRARYNAME$. The Library Extension will no longer check this catalog for any items.

catalogInaccessible.message: The $DESCRIPTION$ is not currently reachable at the current URL ($URL$). This may be a temporary network problem. If this persists, please contact support@libraryextension.com so we can investigate the problem further.
